N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7403.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with
the requirements of this Part, the Office of Children and Family Services
(OCFS) shall develop written policies and procedures that govern admissions at
an OCFS secure facility. The written policies and procedures shall be reviewed
annually and updated as needed. (b) Consistent with the requirements of this Part, OCFS shall develop policies and
procedures to require that all residents are admitted to OCFS secure facilities
in accordance with law and in a manner which protects the safety of all persons
and the security of the facility. (c) Only residents lawfully committed to, placed in or transferred to an OCFS secure facility shall be admitted to such
facility. Notes
